query: Need to implement UOW-04 for change_id 001. Requesting: 1) Relevant project knowledge for scene asset service, asset error classes, and specs. 2) Exact file locations. 3) Prior learnings on timeout/retry, LoadEvent valid types, error taxonomy (fetch/parse/budget). 4) Exploration guidance.
